name: JavaScript Zelda
description:
CONTROLS: WASD to move, J and K to attack and use item

OVERVIEW: Technically speaking, this was my very first attempt at developing a video game. Inspired by a childhood obsession with Zelda games, this was made entirely using  HTML, javascript, and the P5 play libraries which allowed for easier graphics processing and usability. It's not much to look at, and performance gets very poor as the game runs, but I felt like sharing it to show my progression as a game developer. Hope you enjoy this bootleg Zelda dungeon!
